Solar panels: Install solar panels on your roof or walls to generate electricity to charge your devices.
Hand-cranked generator: Purchase a hand-cranked generator to generate electricity when batteries run out.
Kinetic energy converter: Use a kinetic energy converter to harness the energy generated by your movements to charge your devices.
Fuel cells: Use fuel cells to generate electricity for your devices.
Battery-free devices: Switch to battery-free devices that use alternative power sources such as solar or kinetic energy.
